State of Illinois
Cook County SS:

Aaron F. Wells of said County being duly sworn saith that for some eight years past he has been clerk of the Metropolitan Hotel in the city of Chicago in said County, and that for about two years one Silas L. Greenman was employed as Porter at said Hotel, and that during all of said time said Freeman sustained a most excell^e^nt reputation for honesty, integrity & industry & in fact was one of the best men ever employed in a similar capacity in said Hotel.
And this Deponent further saith that during all of said time the wages of said Greenman were paid to his mother, who was wholly dependant upon him for her support.
Sworn before me this 23d Day of May A.D. 1864.

O. R. W. Lull
Notary Publ
